1645.text:
- I'm sorry that was so quick. 
- Not a great final round.

1648.text: Well, it can happen. It really can. And the triennium thing...

1654.text: I think it probably would be something like tri-millennium.

1658.text: I think we probably rushed that one a bit as well.

1660.text:
- Yeah, cos it looked like it was so obvious. 
- Yeah.

1663.text:
- I hope you've enjoyed coming. 
- Yeah, no, it's been a great day.

1666.text: Brilliant team. We say commiserations to Quiz Park Raisins.

1669.text: Dave, you're forgiven them now for their comments

1672.text:
- about Manchester United? 
- No. 
- THEY LAUGH

1675.text: The Eggheads have done what comes naturally to them.

1679.text: So it means that you won't be going home with the £8,000.

1681.text: The money, therefore, rolls over to our next show.

1684.text: Eggheads, very well done. Who will beat you?

1686.text: Join us next time to see if a new team of Challengers

1689.text: have the brains to defeat the Eggheads.

1692.text: £9,000 says they don't. Till then, goodbye.
